# cpdf

cpdf is a pure-python cli application for manipulating PDF files.

## Installation

```bash
pip install -U cpdf
```

## Usage

```bash
$ cpdf --help
Usage: cpdf [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]...

  cpdf is a pure-python cli application for manipulating PDF files.

Options:
  --version
  --help     Show this message and exit.

Commands:
  2-up
  extract-images

$ cpdf
```
